description:
Toriko`s quest to get stronger leads the dynamic culinary duo to a remote cafe in the middle of a jet black lake. The food is fantastic, but the clientele is deadly!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: New Phase! Toriko`s Decision and the Reunion with `Him`!
Shinkyokumen! Toriko no Ketsui to "Yatsu" to no Saikai!
新局面! トリコの決意と"奴"との再会!
